an7.4:1.3: Saddhabalam, viriyabalam, hiribalam, ottappabalam, satibalam, samadhibalam, pannabalam.
an7.4:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an7.4:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an7.4:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an7.4:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako hirima hoti, hiriyati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriyati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.4:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ottappi hoti, ottappati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.4:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
an7.4:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
